website_summaries.verdict: While it may give skin a small boost, this serum doesn't bring the full benefits of collagen to the table.
pros: Brightens skin and helps reduce the appearance of aging
Vitamin C helps skin feel and look refreshed
The collagen in this product is natural, giving skin a plumping effect
cons: Many users saw no difference in their skin

customer_reviews.title: Scammy
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this....picture lies, does not come in glass bottle with pump as usual, comes in a tiny plastic bottle, and OH YEAH, it's not even a full bottle. You get more like .18oz than .25oz. Total ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: The bottle says it expired two years ago and it does not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product. The bottle says it expired two years ago and it does not look like the picture. It comes in a small, plastic container and whatever liquid is inside is not Ole Henriksen
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product I’ve bought in the passed from Sephora. It doesn’t have a sweet citrus smell, instead a rancid one. Do not waste your money, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love it! About to repurchase!
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this to me with the following instructions: Apply two pumps on fingers then pat on face, let dry and then apply moisture. I’ve been using it for a little while and have gotten compliments asking what I’m doing different. Will be getting a refill soon!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Expired product
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Just purchased Jan 2017. My face kept breaking out. Checked the bottle and it expired in 2015.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life
customer_reviews.text: I can't say too much about my 'beauty' routine. It's next to non existent. On the few occasions I've had a facial over the last number of years though, I always come away feeling proud of myself as the beautician will invariably congratulate me on using a vitamin c serum (I also ignore conveniently the chastising I get for the failures in the rest of my routine...). Hooked on this product. I have fair, combination skin. This keeps the dry bits soft, and has been awesome at helping my skin heal if I have caught a little bit too much sun. and a little bit goes a long way. This is one of my skin care luxuries.
customer_reviews.author: jdawser

customer_reviews.title: Not a pump dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product but not this packaging. The dispenser is a spray type and not a pump as on the 1.0 oz bottle. The serum is a great product but it is better to buy the larger bottle. I poured the .5 oz into my 1.0 bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it smelled like a creamsicle. Maybe it gave me a little extra glow, but I really didn’t notice a difference after using religiously.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine lines
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Such a noticeable difference in my skin appearance and how well it helps with fine lines. I use this also as an eye serum and it's perfect. I have combination skin and this just evens out all of it. Looking forward to another purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Effective for anti-aging
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and I swear by it. Very lightweight and non-greasy, it works well with any other beauty product I use for my face. It has completely changed my skin for the better.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product immediately made my skin feel soft and nourished. I am optimistic that I will see positive results.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi

customer_reviews.title: Smells like heaven, works even better
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite products to apply for my morning routine. The smell of oranges is SO lovely, especially when you're just waking up. Makes my skin feel so hydrated and silky. It's a little pricey, yes, but I honestly can't imagine not using this now. I save money on using less foundation/make up overall because it's improved my skin and natural glow. :)
customer_reviews.author: Paige Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum and use it twice a day. I believe it has done wonders for minimizing fine lines on my face. I have been using it for about two years and have seen definite improvement.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clevenger

customer_reviews.title: Untimely delivery always.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The vitamin C really helps keep your skin tone more even and helps maintain a firmer skin. One PROBLEM, delivery is always delayed by many days and the seller does not make an effort to keep the customer satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: rosa batlle

customer_reviews.title: After a few months left behind almost permanent dark brown freckles and blotches (making it look almost like melasma) that she did not have prior to using ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother. She used it Am and PM. After a few months left behind almost permanent dark brown freckles and blotches (making it look almost like melasma) that she did not have prior to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my skin
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for 3 years daily alternating only recently with exuviance bionic serum. I immediately noticed a difference in my skin. I'm 41 years old yet my skin looks supple and youthful. I tell all of my hair clients to buy it!! Big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil is great
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It is not greasy for long after its application. It has a nice clean scent. It makes my skin soft and smooth. This is my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I don’t get the hype with this serum. The bottle is sooooooo small. It feels good the second u put it on, but honestly it dries my skin. I’ll go back to the ORDINARY.
customer_reviews.author: BEATRICE Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff. Goes on sooooo smooth and makes my ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff. Goes on sooooo smooth and makes my skin feel so supple. Had a few fine lines under my eyes and they have virtually disappeared after 1-2 months use. It is cheaper to buy from Sephora - $72 for 1.7 oz bottle.
customer_reviews.author: HelloKimy

customer_reviews.title: silkysmooth
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it long enough to tell how well it works but feels great on my face!

customer_reviews.title: Really like this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product & it does not break me out as many products do. Price is a bit high for size.

customer_reviews.title: love this !
customer_reviews.text: i had scars all over my face ... using this has really cleared up my face. has my skin glowing !

customer_reviews.title: Nice Texture and Smell - Great Results
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Smells like oranges, has a lovely gel/oil feel, and both firms my face and makes it glow.

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful!
customer_reviews.text: Just began to use this - lightweight, absorbed quickly, a bit of a citrus smell. It was recommended by a friend.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Took away all puffyness under the eyes in two weeks. Using it once a day. You will not be disappointed. Will be continuing to purchase this product from now on.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing skin treatment serum!
customer_reviews.text: This serum not only smoothes my skin but is worth every penny! I look years younger!

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy costumer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two, but only received one?
customer_reviews.text: Iove this product, but I ordered 2 of these, and only received one, in a yellow envelope thrown on my front porch outside the gate, although the gate was open. Also the yellow envelope was not closed... How do we fix this?

customer_reviews.text: This does not have the consistency or scent of the original product. Half of the liquid had leaked in the bag and it has an expiration date of 2015. Product returned. I would definitely not put this on my face

customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, so so so much. It gives my skin such a glow. I forward to put it on every morning. :) It's a treat for the face ;)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I received a sample of this serum when I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this serum when I ordered another product, and knew from using that small sample that it was a product that I was going to want to continue using. I apply one pump (about a dime size amount) once or twice a day (morning and/or night) after cleansing my face, followed by my usual eye cream and face moisturizer. It really does seem to aid in retaining moisture and minimizing signs of aging. The texture and citrusy scent are also pleasant, and it absorbs quickly. I plan to continue using it in my daily routine.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really seen any improvement yet. I may need to use it longer. We'll see.

I have been using this product for over a year and absolutely love how it makes my skin look and feel.

Makes skin look healthy n bright.. after u use this n the truth oil u only need a small amount of cream so everything lasts a while but your skin looks great.

customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Been using it for years it has done wonders for my skin and I am in my 60's

customer_reviews.title: This serum is perfect for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Must get with it ::: serums moisturizer the size while lotion and creams just merely sit on the surface ! This serum is perfect for all skin types. It is loaded with vitamin C which compliments the Vitamin E! Boost your collagen and heal your uneven skin tone. You won't regret this purchase. And don't forget to apply some to your neck as well !

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Broken pump when I got it
customer_reviews.text: I have been battling dry skin ever since I moved to a place with actual winters. This oil helps keep my face moisturized and elastic. The pump was slightly broken and hard to push down when it arrived but fortunately I had a second Ole Henriksen vita c oil bottle to use instead. I love the way this serum makes your face feel smooth and moisturized without feeling oily. It's quite slick but soaks into your skin in minutes.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum, its light weight and absorbs fast.

customer_reviews.text: Best product ever. Using it daily, I find my skin looking healthy and younger, and feeling firmer. I would recommend this to everyone I know

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it every day after washing my face and before applying a face oil or moisturizer. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, feels like a healthy infusion of vitamin C that absorbs right in, and I love the scent.

customer_reviews.title: Serum that works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. It is highly recommended and I use it consistently with results. However this was delivered late and I needed it on a certain day so I'm returning.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I received a sample from a friend a while ago & finally bought it for myself. Package arrived right on time with no damage. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Went thru the wholesale bottle. Not impressed. Gave a three bc it didn't do anything bad but definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Truth Serum
customer_reviews.text: Ole Henriksen Truth Serum is a soothing morning treatment for my 66 year old skin. I smooth it over my face/neck and once dry I apply his facial creme which is another highly recommended product. The wrinkles are just as prominent as ever but I use his product because the discolorations have faded and my skin feels refreshed after application. Until I started using the serum I did not realize how irritating my previous products were for my aging skin and eyes. This is my second purchase. Using one or two squirts on your fingertips and only in the morning (as recommended) the serum should last about 10 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: teacherpt

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't live without this stuff. It ships fast and works great and I like that it sells for the same price of a few $$ cheaper than at Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Shannoer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product. I like the way it makes my skin look and feel. I hope for collagen...

customer_reviews.title: I strong recommended to buy it
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Will buy it again. You will see the result in 10 days. This is second time I brought it

customer_reviews.text: Have been using this one and off for years. I occasionally want to find something that is being touted as the "newest, latest and greatest", but I always go back to this. Goes on smoothly, penetrates in, and doesn't irritate. Just use Ole's moisturizer with the spf and I am good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: My skin became so much brighter with this
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line this is one of the best serums for your face.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I had received a sample and was excited when I found this on line. I really like this product. Finally something that works and does not break out my skin. Will go back for more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Parr

customer_reviews.title: There is a slight warmth that comes with application which I don't love but I can get past it since my sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: Only been using it for 3 days but I can feel a difference already. There is a slight warmth that comes with application which I don't love but I can get past it since my sensitive skin seems to love it! I have rosacea and eczema and dry skin all over lately. It was getting very uncomfortable so I tried this serum. I'm so glad I did! Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Lashes

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 29 and love taking care of my skin ....well I'm not getting younger and I want to look great for longer! I start using this product every night and I start feeling my skin like silk. It looks amazing too. As this product has Vitamin C my doctor recommend me to use a higher sunblock. So I was using 15 before and now I'm using 30. I recommend this product to people who likes taking care of their skin and want's to see big improves! Love it and I'll get it again!
customer_reviews.author: Ana M.G

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this product twice a day for a month i can tell a difference in the my skin looks, much softer and smoother. Now people want to know what I have doing for my skin. will definitely keep using it

customer_reviews.title: I won't order again
customer_reviews.text: I do not see the results claimed in the description.

customer_reviews.title: Fine, not great
customer_reviews.text: Fine, not great. And why must they add yellow dye to it. I'd by it if it were clear, and it would be healthier.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. This is my second bottle. Will continue to use. My face feels so smooth

customer_reviews.title: It works very well at keeping my face hydrated and looking youthful.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It works very well at keeping my face hydrated and looking youthful. I usually apply this right out of the shower, my face still damp. I then finish off with Clinque's Moisture Surge Overnight Mask, My face stays soft and supple all day.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I'm 25 with little to no signs of aging but I can tell a difference in how tight my skin feels after a couple days' use. Will probably use it forever.
customer_reviews.author: Laney DuBose

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I was worried it would cause breakouts because it is a serum, not even close. My skin has glow about it. Best skin care product I have ever found.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely would recommend would recommend this product to anyone who has acne scars, sun damage, or age spots. It's not a miracle "cure all", but it's as close as you'll get.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I watched Ole H. on QVC but his products, in my opinion, are over priced for the results you get! I'm kind of disappointed to have spent over $200 for his products that didn't have the best results! I get better results using Oil of Olay for a much more affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This product has completely re-texturized my skin! I've always had "okay" skin. Not bad, not great--just okay. After a month of using Truth Serum, it's like I have a whole new face. Pores--gone! Dry, flaky patches--nope! I can't say enough about this stuff. I'm hooked!I use a little before bed and a little more when I wake up in the morning. I now have the skin of that girl women are jealous of because she can run to the grocery store with no makeup on. :)
customer_reviews.author: Texas Kriet

customer_reviews.title: it's a good product
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. I have a mixt type of skin and after a couple of days of using this serum my skin looks better, my skin is brighter.

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it
customer_reviews.text: Best Vitamin C serum out there. Don't live without it!
customer_reviews.author: ARCgirl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived and the box was completely falling apart, almost like it had been chewed on by an animal. The bottle was just barely half full. Definitely not worth full price, sending back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Phenominal
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product on and off for 10 years. This is the only product I use on my face, forehead and neck besides Murad Essential-C face wash and moisturizer/sun block. It firms, brightens and tones skins and gets rid of crows feet and mild wrinkles. It even fixed the horrible dark pools under my eyes. There is no need to use it more than maybe 2-3 times per week after face wash and before whatever moisturizer and/or sunblock you like. Let it soak in for at least two minutes before moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Product is good, but arrived leaked
customer_reviews.text: So amazing results that my 6 year old noticed that my face is clearer without blemishes and was wondering that I may not get old like grandma 😊 However, the first bottle I used was bought at Sephora. The bottle I got from Amazon had leaked and only a quarter of the product left. Spare some shopping time and buy it at stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: This serum is just ok for me - it's a ...
customer_reviews.text: This serum is just ok for me - it's a little sticky, and I didn't get any warming sensation as some others mentioned. Haven't noticed any difference in my skin. Will probably try a different brand when I'm through the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a huge difference in my skin! After a ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes a huge difference in my skin! After a month of use, my skin feels a lot softer and looks much more even.
customer_reviews.author: Kazandra

customer_reviews.title: The product does not work. And that’s the truth.
customer_reviews.text: Funny how a product named “truth serum” does not tell the truth. Been using for 2 weeks, daily once in the morning and once at night- saw no difference in skin texture, smoothness, firmness or brightness. The product is sticky and has a nice orangey smell but that’s all there is to it. Guess they have a good PR machine going as I see the product highly rated everywhere. I found the claims to be not-truth!
customer_reviews.author: RSN

product_meta.title: Ole Henriksen Truth Serum Collagen Booster, 1.0 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Size:1 OunceA great skin booster infused with a high powered vitamin c complex to help smooth out lines and wrinkles while preventing further damage loaded with anti-oxidants to fight off environment aggressors and moisture-binding ingredients to hydrate and keep your skin nourished and protected
feature_bullets: Totally weightless, this aromatic serum is absorbed instantly and penetrates to the deeper layers of the skin where it goes to work to provide long term results
A must,have preventative and corrective product
Sensitive skin, prone to irritation will benefit immensely from the calming properties of this serum
